course.subject: ELEC
course.name: Linking Neural and Perceptual Systems
course.description: In this graduate seminar, we will read and critique research articles on the neural underpinnings of perception, with a focus on vision and audition. Here's a preliminary list of topics: 1) Vision: Contrast sensitivity and acuity, Stereopsis, Motion perception, Object recognition, Color perception, Active vision; 2) Audition: Critical bands and critical ratios, Pitch perception, Sound localization, The precedence effect, Auditory scene analysis, Active listening. Graded P or F.
